RaptMate

RaptMate is a project designed to monitor and display sensor data from a BLE-enabled device (RaptPill) using a React-based web interface and an ESP32-based backend. Source code is available on GitHub.

Features

  • Collects data from RAPT pills using ESP32 devices.
  • BLE integration for real-time sensor data collection.
  • Wi-Fi configuration via a user-friendly interface.
  • Responsive React-based frontend for data visualization.
  • Open-source and customizable for your needs.

Install

Select your device from the list below and click 'Connect'.
Note: You may need to hold the 'BOOT' button on the device while pressing install.
